*Mantella frowns as she see's Megatron and Waspinator fire at Shredder*
Mantella: Umm...Megatron...you should at least give him a chance...
*Mantella says then clutches her face hping that Megatron won't open fire on
her*
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 22, 2000 7:15 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Shredder::
>
> Shredder is slammed against the wall as Megatron's and Waspinator's shots
hit
> him. With a scream of pain, he manages to roll a bit to the left,
mechfluid
> flowing from his battered chest.
>
> "Megatron!" he yells from where he was now crouching, slightly out of line
of
> fire from Megatron, "Hold your fire. We both know that you need equipment.
I
> can provide it for you! Scrap metal, parts of scanners, it's all
repairable."
>
